name: The Sky Above The Port
description: "The sky above the port was the color of television, tuned to a dead channel.". My interpretation of the opening line of Neuromancer. What if the sky were actually made of static? // Hand-written global illumination Monte Carlo pathtracer renderer, with atmospheric scattering, in 180 lines of JS + 220 lines of GLSL // 8 frames 1080p GIF // By Piter Pasma // https://piterpasma.nl
